metadata.title: Masala Chaas|మసాలా మజ్జిగ| మా కొలతల్లో ఓ సారి మసాలా మజ్జిగ చేసి చూడండి ఎంతో రుచిగా ఉంటుంది
metadata.description: Masala Majjiga or Masala Chaas is a perfect summer drink to beat the heat. This spiced buttermilk recipe by Vismai Food uses fresh herbs like mint and coriander along with ginger and roasted cumin powder to create a refreshing and healthy beverage that aids digestion and cools the body.

transcription_english: [00:00] Hello Foodies, Welcome to Vismai Food. Today's special is Masala Majjiga (Spiced Buttermilk).
[00:04] It is the perfect drink for this summer.
[00:06] If you make two to three liters, keep it in the fridge, and drink it leisurely, your body cools down, and the summer feels comfortable without any restlessness. Let's start.
[00:13] In a mixer jar, add a quarter cup of chopped coriander.
[00:16] A quarter cup of chopped mint leaves.
[00:18] Half an inch of chopped ginger.
[00:20] One green chili.
[00:22] Half a teaspoon of black salt.
[00:25] Three-quarters of a teaspoon of roasted cumin powder, you must add this.
[00:29] Add two teaspoons of lemon juice and grind it finely first.
[00:34] Then add half a liter of fresh, tasty curd without cream.
[00:38] Add one and a quarter liters of water to it and blend on high speed.
[00:41] According to Ayurveda, perfect buttermilk means one part curd to four parts water.
[00:45] I took a ratio of one to two and a half.
[00:47] If you like, you can do that too by adjusting the ingredients.
[00:50] If you drink it immediately, the freshness is wonderful.
[00:53] Drink a glass during breakfast, lunch, and dinner this summer, and you will see how pleasant it feels.
[00:58] Did you like it? Then try it and definitely post the picture on Vismai Food Instagram sharing how it turned out for you.
[01:03] Don't forget to visit the vismaifood.com website for more recipes.
